name: Argadnet
tag_list: online-advertising, online-game, quest, marketing, alternative, reality, game, advertising, network
overview:
Argadnet is an interactive software platform that combines innovative ideas with the needs of their clients by turning advertising into a game.

Argadnet’s goal is to make advertising fun and efficient. They combine innovative ideas with the needs of their clients to deliver extremely effective advertising.

The Argadnet platform creates and uses an original quest game as an online advertising tool for marketing and advertising companies. They can create a new game to serve any company, any situation, and/or any demographic. The target market is any company that uses traditional online advertising tools including, but not limited to contextual advertising, media advertising, and to a lessor extent, any company that advertises online.

Argadnet’s product and service can be tried and tested for a fraction of the cost of traditional forms of online advertising. They feel that this fact alone will motivate potential clients to try their product and service.
